mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sepay.event (user_id, begin_date, end_date, title, todo, color, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{title}, #{todo}, #{color}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM event WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND begin_date >= DATE_SUB(DATE(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-01')), INTERVAL 15 DAY) AND end_date <= DATE_ADD(LAST_DAY(DATE(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-01'))), INTERVAL 15 DAY) ORDER BY begin_date
